body.p: To his Hon B. Magoffin Governor &c

Your Petitioner Geo Huston will state that on the day of April 1861 one Patrick Wyatt was arrested by warrant for Peddling without Lisence and brought before the undersigned as Presiding Judge of the Union County Court and a jury empannelled and the case tried and a verdict and judgment against said Wyatt was rendered

That upon the trial the accused produced Liscense regulary issued by the Jefferson County court for the state at large but said Patrick failed to produce the liscense to the clerk of Union County and have the same certified by him that believing the accused to have been ignorant of that future of the law the Jury replieved $75 the portion of the fine belonging to the commth and Wyatt paid the cost & county 1/4 25$. Hence your Petitioner requests a remission of the $25 fine

Geo Huston
Judge U. C. C.
